title: sarvEshA aDimaiyai
sahitya:
sarvEshA aDimaiyai nI udarit-taLLAdE shankara sadAshivanE


anupallavi

  parvata rAjakumAri manOhara parama dayA karanE puraharanE


caraNam    pEshat-terinda annAL mudal un tirup-pEr sholli manam naindu pADinEnE
piravit-taLai arukkum perumAnenrunai nambi pENip-pugazhndu padam nADinEnE
pUsittilEn unadu aDiyAruDan kalandu nEshittilEn vESamiTTADinEnE
ponkaravum viSamum paNiyAi aNinda nIyen pizhai poruttAL ammaiyappA mayilai vaLar
